siteMetadata.about:
I am an experienced full-stack developer able to build any kind of project from the ground up. I have been focusing mostly on React, React Native and Node (Express JS).

Skilled at writing well-designed, testable and efficient code using current best practices.

I am an hard-working and responsible person, able to work by myself or in a team.

I am working fully remotely since 2016.

✅ Excellent knowledge of JavaScript / ES8
✅ More than 5 years in web / mobile development
✅ AWS Certified Developer – Associate
✅ High-quality code with good documentation
